# axonops_cassandra_adaptive_repair (Data Source)

Reads Cassandra adaptive repair settings for a cluster.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cluster_name` (String) The name of the cluster.

### Optional

- `cluster_type` (String) The cluster type (cassandra or dse). Default: cassandra

### Read-Only

- `active` (Boolean) Whether adaptive repair is enabled.
- `blacklisted_tables` (List of String) List of tables excluded from repair.
- `filter_twcs_tables` (Boolean) Whether TWCS tables are excluded.
- `gc_grace_threshold` (Number) GC grace period threshold in seconds.
- `parallelism` (Number) Number of tables to repair concurrently.
- `segment_retries` (Number) Maximum retry attempts per segment.
- `segment_target_size_mb` (Number) Target segment size in MB.
- `segments_per_vnode` (Number) Number of segments per vnode.
